page.title: 15The Airedale Health Clinic
page.content: When we visited the{clinic}we found out about the things that happen there. Ante & post natal care from midwife. Mother/baby clinic to check wgt. growth development of faculties & to administer protective injections. Doctor on duty. Regular surgery held by local practice. Chiropody clinic dealing mainly with old age pensioners Very few young patients. Speech therapist works with children who are referred by school medical service. School psychological service carries out tests, assessments & treatment as needed. Social service monitor their list of children at risk cases drawing together all agencies concerned with a child. We saw some babies being weighed. They come every week when they are tiny.Mums are given tokens to exchange for tins of baby milk and food.
